'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The heart of [[Rauatai]]an operations in the Deadfire, the Brass Citadel is a modern fortification and the hub for all military operations in the region, built in 2818 AI. It is the hub for all military operations in the region carved out of a section of coastal Neketaka. The kingdom uses it primarily as a central storehouse for keeping its sailor's fed, armed, and paid on the long campaign away from home, rather than an embassy.

==Points of interest==
* This is a large, outdoor location full of Rauataian soldiers and guns. It can be divided into three distinct levels. 
* The lowest level contains the docks and [[Uto's gunsmithy]]. [[Bertenno]] can be found here if you are pursuing his quest. 
* The middle courtyard contains the [[Fleet Master's Office (The Brass Citadel)|fleet master's office]], [[officers lounge]], and the entrance to the [[powderhouse]] building, which contains the bulk of gunpowder reserves of the RDC. 
* The upper level has the entrance to [[Imperial Command]], responsible for prosecuting the kingdom's campaign in the Deadfire.

==Characters==
* [[Emeini]], a sailor punished by being forced to hold a red-hot cannonball.
* [[Orlan Peddler]], a native of the Rauatai Gulf. Sells some unique equipment.

'''During [[Velvet Glove, Brass Fist]]'''
* [[Bertenno]], on the run from The Dark Cupboard.
* [[Hamuto Stoneheel]], Rauataian officer.

'''During [[The Archmage's Vault]]'''
* [[Tumara]], she awaits your return.

==Loot==
* [[Dragon's Dowry]], [[Scordeo's Trophy]]: Sold by Uto.
* [[Charm of Bones]], [[Ring of Greater Regeneration]]: Sold by the orlan peddler.

==Pets==
* [[Pes]] - "Orphaned Dog": Near the cliffside entrance to the Imperial Command.
* [[Cajux]] - "Forsaken Cat": To the right of the entrance to the powderhouse.
